aboutCards.heading: What is AEMMA
aboutCards.p1: The Academy of European Medi√¶val Martial Arts (AEMMA) is a Historical European Medieval Martial Arts School with locations across Canada. We have been teaching medieval swordfighting for 25 years.

aboutCards.heading: What classes does AEMMA Ottawa offer?
aboutCards.p1: Our Ottawa chapter is committed to training, scholarship, and preserving the martial heritage and rich traditions of Historical European Martial Arts (HEMA), with a focus on Bolognese sidesword from the 16th century.

aboutCards.heading: What historical sources does AEMMA use?
aboutCards.p1: AEMMA Ottawa bases its classes on manuscripts from real fighting masters such as Fiore dei Liberi, Giovanni Dall‚ÄôAgocchie, Marozzo, et al.

aboutCards.heading: Where is AEMMA Ottawa located?
aboutCards.p1: AEMMA Ottawa is located at  1606 Fisher Ave in Nepean, just West of Mooney's Bay.

aboutCards.heading: How can I join AEMMA Ottawa?

cards.title: Training
cards.text: We study and apply historical techniques from authentic manuscripts.

cards.title: Rich history
cards.text: Our methods are rooted in the martial traditions of the 15th and 16th centuries.

cards.title: Supportive, inclusive community
cards.text: We welcome martial artists of all levels and backgrounds.
